description.value:
By combining a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Alchemist's Fire (Lesser)]{Alchemist's Fire (Lesser)}, a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Thunderstone (Lesser)]{Thunderstone (Lesser)}, and other catalysts with a pressure sensitive trigger, you create a snare that creates a fiery and thunderous explosion when triggered. The target and all creatures in adjacent squares take [[/r {2d6[fire],2d6[sonic]}]]{2d6 fire damage and 2d6 sonic damage} with a basic @Check[type:reflex|dc:19|traits:mechanicle] save. On a failure, they are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Deafened]{Deafened} for [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds} and take [[/r {1d4}[persistent,fire]]] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Fire Damage}.

Craft Requirements Supply a lesser alchemist's fire and a lesser thunderstone.
